thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com
thread.title: Jackie

author: Jackie
title: Jackie
text: I had to try for two days to get your cash page to work! I could not complete the order. it was not cashe and cookies or my browser. After several attempts my credit card was flagged for $1,500!!! my orders were less than $300! I called American Express they declined the single order for protection. Then I gave them permission to allow the $224.00 charge to go through. So, I attempted one last time and FINALLY after TWO days ans dozens of attempts my order went through and the finale sale page opened.
